Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Client
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMIClient, SocketClient
public abstract class Client extends Object
The Client abstract class is used to represents user's identity It also provides methods to inform user about some action result/error
